title: [motion graphics] "Trusted Computing" by Benjamin Stephan & Lutz Vogel
content:
“Trusted Computing” by Benjamin Stephan & Lutz Vogel  
2007 Adobe Design Achievement Award winners  
 [http://www.adaagallery.com/winners/8.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112014948/http:/www.adaagallery.com/winners/8.php "http://www.adaagallery.com/winners/8.php")

author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content: Wonderful thang, thanks for posting! But why has the type be so tight… ah, cause of the nightmarish topic, great – klick that link.

Alessandro,

Thanks for posting...its really great!  
I had the same impression as poms: type to tight, no?

António Fonseca
